update `admin`

update `admin` set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `role` = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from admin where role = 'agency'
and remark like CONCAT('%', #{remark}, '%')
and user_address like CONCAT('%', #{userAddress}, '%')
order by id desc limit #{page},#{size}

select count(1) from admin where role = 'agency'
and remark like CONCAT('%', #{remark}, '%')
and user_address like CONCAT('%', #{userAddress}, '%')
